attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After listening to many local radio stations and reading papers i know the goverment has no idea how bad the violent crime in the UK is every day dozens of  incidents . Yet no police to be seen on the streets in lancashire . Yet you can t miss them driving around the roads in fancy cars pulling motorists , anyone can do that 
Put them back on the streets so they can do police work .we need more police  on the beat to help deter crime . Does the public agree we need more police walking the streets .

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
